name: .MDN File Extension
summary: Learn about .MDN files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An MDN file is a blank template created by Microsoft Access to replicate the structure of a database. It contains information about a database structure, including tables, forms, and queries, but does not include any actual database data. Blank database templates stored in MDN files allow Access users to set up the framework of a database from a clean slate they can reproduce to tailor it to specific tasks or projects handling different types of data.

instructions: You can open MDN files with Microsoft Access in Windows.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
